data.description: Join IMEG as a Sustainability & Innovation Intern in Naperville, IL, Madison, WI, or St Louis, MO. In this 10–12 week program, you’ll support the Innovation team by providing technical assistance, documenting workflows, and exploring new technologies that drive strategic projects. You’ll contribute to early-stage initiatives, shadow senior specialists, and gain hands-on experience with tools and methods shaping the firm of the future. At IMEG, sustainability is at the core of our work—we’re committed to reducing carbon footprints, advancing sustainable outcomes, and delivering innovative solutions that promote environmental stewardship. Principal Responsibilities Participate in brainstorming sessions to contribute fresh ideas for innovation projects Assist in data collection and reporting for Innovation projects Assist with researching emerging technologies related to Innovation team objectives Present research findings and project progress to the Innovation team Maintain an innovation log to track ideas, issues, and improvements during projects Provide team and engineer support (virtual and on-site) by troubleshooting and assisting with technology issues Document processes and workflows to support knowledge sharing and consistency Required Qualifications and Skills Completed at least 2 years towards a Bachelor of Science (BS) Degree in Engineering, Architecture, or equivalent required Prior internship experience in the building design consulting industry preferred Strong interest in innovation Working knowledge of data principles, tools, and frameworks Working knowledge of engineering principles Proficient with MS Office Suite including, but not limited to, Word, Excel, and Outlook Ability to clearly communicate in both oral and written communication to individuals or groups This position is not eligible for sponsorship. Why Join Us: At IMEG, people are our priority — with a solid focus on career growth, work-life balance, and making a meaningful impact. As a 100% employee-owned firm, we combine the resources of a national design leader with the supportive culture of a local office. You’ll work alongside colleagues from diverse disciplines, contribute to innovative and sustainable projects, and help shape the communities we serve. Join a team where ideas are welcomed, professional development is supported, and every contribution makes a difference. Sustainability & Innovation Team Highlights Work with cutting-edge tools like our MEG AI( for chats, calculations and reporting), VR/AR, carbon modeling, and data dashboards that are transforming design and construction. Contribute to sustainability-focused projects while developing career paths such as Innovation Specialist or VR Lead. IMEG’s IDEA Program Inclusive Innovation: Open to all employees, empowering anyone to develop and scale new ideas. Real Impact: Since 2022, IDEA initiatives—like VR experiences, AI-driven tools, and sustainability calculators—have improved workflows and client outcomes on hundreds of projects. Career Growth: With 600+ active innovators, IDEA fosters cross-disciplinary collaboration, career development, and a culture of curiosity. Locations available: Naperville, IL Madison, WI St Louis, MO Hourly Range $22.00 - $24.00. Minimums and maximums may vary based on location. Individual pay will be based on several factors including experience, knowledge, skills, and abilities of the applicant. Other rewards may include annual bonuses and stock ownership options. In addition, IMEG Corp. provides a variety of benefits to employees, including health insurance coverage, an employee wellness program, life and disability insurance, a retirement savings plan, paid holidays, and paid time off (PTO). This information is being provided in compliance with local laws. Additional information regarding employee benefits may be found on our company website at Join us to explore cutting-edge tools and bold ideas—driving innovation, advancing sustainability, and helping shape the firm of the future. IMEG, an employee-owned corporation, is committed to investing in employees’ futures through professional development programs and opportunities for career advancement. We offer a comprehensive benefits package including generous PTO, flexible schedule, and assistance with tuition reimbursement. Additionally, employees are eligible to enroll in health, dental, vision, and life insurance on their first day of employment. Want to learn more about IMEG and our other amazing career opportunities? Please visit https://www.imegcorp.com/careers/. IMEG is committed to providing equal employment opportunities in all employment practices, without regard to race, color, religion, sex (including sexual orientation or gender identity), gender, national origin, disability, age, genetic information (including family medical history), parental status (including pregnancy, childbirth or related medical conditions including lactation), ethnic origin, hair type (including hairstyle or hair texture), citizenship status, marital status, military service, veteran’s status, political affiliation, non-merit-based factors, or any other characteristic protected by law. In accordance with antidiscrimination law, it is the purpose of this policy to put into effect these principles and mandates. IMEG prohibits discrimination and harassment of any type. IMEG conforms to the spirit as well as to the letter of all applicable laws and regulations. All applicants have the right to request access, correction, and deletion of their personal information from our system. In order to make a request, please email careers@imegcorp.com. As a people-centered engineering firm we know IMEG’s brand is centered around the technical skills of our people. We are 100% employee-owned and we value the collective abilities, expertise, and continuity of our team members. We understand the importance of an engaged culture and the power of teamwork. We believe in investing in our people and their professional futures through continuous training, community involvement, and the ability to develop a niche specialty. We also believe in committing to the same sustainability ideals we encourage for our clients – a practice of reduce, reuse, and recycle. We are IMEG. Important Notice: Protect Yourself from Recruitment Scams IMEG has become aware of unauthorized individuals falsely representing themselves as IMEG Talent Acquisition Specialists. These individuals may contact candidates regarding interviews or job offers. Please be assured that all legitimate communications from IMEG will originate from an official @imegcorp.com email address. If you receive any communication that seems suspicious or you are uncertain about its authenticity, contact us immediately at careers@imegcorp.com. For the most current information about our open positions, please visit our official careers page at www.imegcorp.com/careers.
